text: Suppose that you have defined two minimized DFA D1 & D2 that recognizes the language L1 & L2 respectively; Where L1= {wef{a, b}* | na(w) mod 5 = 4 or na(w) mod 5 = 2} and L2 = {w e{a, b}* | na(w) mod 7 = 3 or na(w) mod 7 = 5}. How many final states are in minimized DFA D, if D is DFA for L, where L =L1~L2?
